org.apache.ambari.server.controller.spi

Interface Request

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RequestImpl

    public interface Request
    The request object carries the properties or property ids required to satisfy a resource request. The request object also contains any temporal (date range) information, if any, for each requested property.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DIRECTIVE_DRY_RUN 
      static String REQUEST_INFO_BODY_PROPERTY
      Constant for request info property which contains the raw request body.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Obtain the pagination request information.

      Get the property values of the request.

      Get the set of property ids being requested.
      Map<String,String> getRequestInfoProperties()
      Get any request info properties of the request.
      SortRequest getSortRequest()
      Obtain information to order the results by.
      TemporalInfo getTemporalInfo(String id)
      Get the temporal information for the given property id for this request, if any.
      boolean isDryRunRequest()
      Is this a dry run request.

    • Field Detail

      • REQUEST_INFO_BODY_PROPERTY

        static final String REQUEST_INFO_BODY_PROPERTY
        Constant for request info property which contains the raw request body.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DIRECTIVE_DRY_RUN

        static final String DIRECTIVE_DRY_RUN
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getPropertyIds

        Set<String> getPropertyIds()
        Get the set of property ids being requested. Used for requests to get resources. An empty set signifies that all supported properties should be returned (i.e. select * ).
        Returns:
        the set of property ids being requested

      • getProperties

        Set<Map<String,Object>> getProperties()
        Get the property values of the request. Used for requests to update or create resources. Each value in the set is a map of properties for a resource being created/updated. Each map contains property values keyed by property ids.
        Returns:
        the set of properties being requested

      • getRequestInfoProperties

        Map<String,String> getRequestInfoProperties()
        Get any request info properties of the request. These are optional properties that are specific to the request but not related to any resource.

      • getTemporalInfo

        TemporalInfo getTemporalInfo(String id)
        Get the temporal information for the given property id for this request, if any.
        Parameters:
        id - the property id
        Returns:
        the temporal information for the given property id; null if noe exists

      • getPageRequest

        PageRequest getPageRequest()
        Obtain the pagination request information. This structure can be used for the concrete ResourceProvider to instruct the caller that the result set has already been paginated.
        Returns:
        the page request information.

      • getSortRequest

        SortRequest getSortRequest()
        Obtain information to order the results by. This structure can be used for the concrete ResourceProvider to instruct the caller that the result set has already been sorted.
        Returns:
        the sort request information.

      • isDryRunRequest

        boolean isDryRunRequest()
        Is this a dry run request.
        Returns:
        true - if request is dry run request, false otherwise.
